caption: Module Activity
description: Module Activity events report when an endpoint process acts on a module.
name: module_activity

references.description: Guidance on the use of "Module Activity: Load" and "Process Activity: Inject".

3.caption: Invoke
3.description: A function exported from the target module was invoked.

actor.description: The actor that performed the activity on the target module. For example, the process that loaded a module into memory.

module.description: The module that was loaded, unloaded, or invoked.
